title: Natural Remedies for Emotional Health
author: Burke Lennihan R N; C C H
description: How easily available remedies can support us in emotional crises
cleaned_text: Burke Lennihan R.N., C.C.H. on December 18, 2012 Natural medicines can help when kids are so traumatized that talking is not enough - when they can't sleep, have nightmares, or won't go to school. These medicines are safe, easily available, FDA-approved for kids, and best of all, kids like taking them.
